step.datasource:
SELECT distinct
a.HID as HeaderID , 'V' as ord_soort , '1' as betaald , '0' as ordbv_afdr , 'S_' + cast(a.HID as varchar(50)) AS refer , isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_02)) as varchar(max)), '') + '/' + isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_03))as varchar(max)), '') AS refer1 , a.FreeTextField_06 AS refer2 , a.FreeTextField_04 as docnumber , 'EUR' as Valcode , c.debnr as debnr , c.debnr as verzdebnr , CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_13, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_07, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (c.cmp_name) ELSE (a.freetextfield_13) END) ELSE (a.freetextfield_13) END collate database_default AS del_debtor_name , cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_14)) as varchar) AS del_ContactPerson , '--' as del_cnt_job_desc , CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_13, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_07, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (c.cmp_fadd1) ELSE (a.freetextfield_07) END) ELSE (a.freetextfield_07) END collate database_default AS del_AddressLine1 , CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_13, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_07, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (c.cmp_fpc) ELSE (a.freetextfield_08) END) ELSE (a.freetextfield_08) END collate database_default AS del_PostCode , CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_13, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_07, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (c.cmp_fcity) ELSE (a.freetextfield_12) END) ELSE (a.freetextfield_12) END collate database_default AS del_City , 'S20' as Magcode , 'ZZ_OP' as kstplcode , a.FreeTextField_10 as selcode , '0' as colli , '0' as Netto_gew , '0' as Bruto_gew , cast(ltrim(rtrim(isnull(a.RequestComments, ''))) as varchar(max)) as Note , a.FreeIntField_03 as fakt_code FROM dbo.Absences AS a (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c (nolock) ON a.CustomerID = c.cmp_wwn LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci (nolock) ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic (nolock) ON c.debnr = vic.debnr left outer join dbo.orkrg ok on ok.refer = 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50))
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 600) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0) and ok.id is null
Group by a.HID , a.FreeTextField_02 , a.FreeTextField_03 , a.FreeTextField_04 , a.FreeTextField_06 , a.FreeTextField_07 , a.FreeTextField_08 , a.FreeTextField_10 , a.FreeTextField_12 , a.FreeTextField_13 , a.FreeTextField_14 , a.RequestComments , c.debnr , c.cmp_name , c.cmp_fadd1 , c.cmp_fpc , c.cmp_fcity , a.FreeIntField_03

SELECT
a.HID as HeaderID , 'TXT-RGL' as artcode , '1' as esr_aantal , 'Servicemelding ' + cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.HID)) as varchar) as oms45 , 'Servicemelding ' + cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.HID)) as varchar) as TextDescription
FROM dbo.Absences AS a (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c (nolock) ON a.CustomerID = c.cmp_wwn LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci (nolock) ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic (nolock) ON c.debnr = vic.debnr
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 600) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0)

SELECT er.newkeyvalue as Ordernumber, at.AttachmentFileName as BinaryFileName, at.Attachment as BinaryDocument, at.AttachmentFileName as subject, 221 as type, 1 as status from [abei].dbo._AB_Entity_results as er with (nolock) inner join [400].dbo.orkrg as ok with (nolock) on er.newkeyvalue collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = ok.ordernr inner join dbo.absences as ab with (nolock) on ab.hid = er.headerid collate Latin1_General_CI_AS inner join dbo.Attachments at on ab.ID = at.Entity where 1=1 and er.jobid = '%jobid%' and er.runid = '%runid%' and er.entity = 'SalesOrderHeader' and er.rowstatus = 2 AND (ab.Type = 600) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_05 = 0)

select top 100 percent a.ID, 1 as freeboolfield_05, MAX(o.ordernr) as freetextfield_11 from [orlaco].dbo.Absences a with (nolock) inner join [ABEI].dbo._AB_Entity_results_log r with (nolock) on r.property = 'Reference' and r.valueString = 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50)) inner join dbo.orkrg o with (nolock) on 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50)) = o.refer where 1=1 and r.jobid = '%jobid%' and r.runid = '%runid%' GROUP BY a.ID
